participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and nostalgic, loves to reminisce about her childhood.
participant_1.background: i love new kids on the block. my favorite toy as a child as my lite brite. i was born in the early 80 s. i also like old school hip hop. i take dance lessons once a week.

participant_2.name: Ryan

participant_2.background: i am a country music singer. i started playing guitar when i was three. we spent summers ring at national parks. my favorite band is rascal flats.
